Indications  
(From 8.1.2 Anthracyclines and other cytotoxic antibiotics: British National Formulary)
Dactinomycin  is principally used to treat paediatric cancers; it is given intravenously. Its side-effects are similar to those of doxorubicin, except that cardiac toxicity is not a problem.
name: DACTINOMYCIN
cautions: Cautions see section 8.1 and notes above; caution in handling—irritant to tissues
side-effects: Side-effects see section 8.1 and notes above
